__e: Well, that's good, because Shirley is the best.
At least he doesn't think Shirley's my mom anymore.
I don't think it's working out.
I was watching you dance with Shirley. And for a second I thought you were having one of your moments where you actually believed you and she were...
I was talking to Shirley... she said the only way to make money in that town is slots.
You, as Shirley's friend and a good guy, just saying what's really in your heart.
Well, do we even want it, Shirley? We can now leave on our own terms.
Didn't need a road map... to find my way around your body, did I, Shirley?
Shirley, I am not going through this again.
